text: Samsung Galaxy A22 is a smartphone made by Samsung. It has a screen that has a resolution of 2400 x 1080 pixels. It also has 48 MP main, 2 MP depth and 2 MP macro cameras. It has a 5000 mAh battery. It runs Android 12. ==References== Category:Samsung Galaxy A-series Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2021
title: Samsung Galaxy A22
